title: No, Mswati didn’t decree men in eSwatini must marry at least two wives or face jail
subtitle: In December 2018, Africa Check debunked a
author: africacheck.org

that the southern African country of eSwatini had passed a law allowing its king, Mswati III, to marry 14-year-old virgins.

Mswati has declared that the men of his country

Early in the post, Mswati is wrongly referred to as “King Malaria III”.

“His Majesty has not made any pronouncement to that effect as it has never been an issue raised by Emaswati. We will continue to appeal for morality, responsible behaviour and professionalism among journalists and the general public with access to social media.”
